testcase.name: tests.unit.test_app
testcase.error: tests/unit/test_app.py:3: in <module> subprocess.run(["/tests/unit/test_app.sh"]) /usr/lib/python3.9/subprocess.py:505: in run with Popen(*popenargs, **kwargs) as process: /usr/lib/python3.9/subprocess.py:951: in __init__ self._execute_child(args, executable, preexec_fn, close_fds, /usr/lib/python3.9/subprocess.py:1837: in _execute_child raise child_exception_type(errno_num, err_msg, err_filename) E FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/tests/unit/test_app.sh'
